page.title: 20ST.MARY'S CHURCH CONTINUED
page.content: In the{NORTH AISLE}there are three semi_circular arches which are Norman in origin.There are also the remains of a small Norman window and a blocked doorway. The{ROOD SCREEN}is one of the most beautiful things in the church.This was constructed in the 15th century. During the{Wars of the Roses}the Church was used as a stable and was damaged during the battles of St.Albans. There are several other parts of the Church which are interesting but too numerous to mention. This information was compiled and written by the children of classes 4L and 4H Redbourn Junior School Summer 1985.
